Document: # Space Law: Restricted Weapons - \[Security\] Lethal firearms, excluding syndicate firearms, proto kinetic accelerators, glaives, daggers, crushers and the antique laser gun - \[Security/Salvage\] Proto kinetic accelerators, glaives, daggers, and crushers - \[Security/Command\] Antique laser gun - \[None\] Syndicate weapons - \[None\] Swords - \[None\] Improvised weaponry, including baseball bats - \[None\] Lethal implants - \[None\] Other lethal weapons
